verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*’s \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \f + \fr 3:1 \ft Jehoram is a variant spelling of Joram; also in verse 6.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahab \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8147"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* father \w and|strong="H3068"\w* mother \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sacred \w pillar|strong="H4676"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* father \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="H7535"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w clung|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* caused \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w commit|strong="H2398"\w*; \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H1692"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Mesha|strong="H4338"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sheep|strong="H5349"\w* \w breeder|strong="H5349"\w*,\f + \fr 3:4 \ft Or sheepherder\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* thousand \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w wool|strong="H6785"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* thousand \w rams|strong="H3733"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ahab, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H6586"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w set|strong="H6485"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* mobilized \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* message \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: “\w The|strong="H7971"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H5927"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*. \w Will|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5927"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H3644"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*,” replied \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*. “\w I|strong="H3644"\w* am \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*, \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H2088"\w* asked, “\w Which|strong="H2088"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*?” “\w By|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* Edom,” replied Joram.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Edom \w set|strong="H5437"\w* \w out|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* traveled \w a|strong="H3068"\w* roundabout \w route|strong="H1870"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w animals|strong="H1961"\w*.

“Alas,” \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w these|strong="H7121"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H6030"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w asked|strong="H1875"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*? Let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “Elisha \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* used \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elijah.\f + \fr 3:11 \ft Or He was Elijah’s personal assistant\f*”

\w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* affirmed, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3381"\w*.” \w So|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Edom \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w Elisha|strong="H7121"\w*, \w however|strong="H3588"\w*, \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w each|strong="H5414"\w* \w other|strong="H7121"\w*? \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* mother!” “\w No|strong="H5414"\w*,” replied \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w these|strong="H7121"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H5375"\w* Elisha said, “\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w were|strong="H3063"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w regard|strong="H5027"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w or|strong="H7200"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* harpist.\f + \fr 3:15 \ft Or a musician; twice in this verse\f*” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* harpist \w played|strong="H5059"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Elisha

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘Dig \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* \w full|strong="H1356"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w ditches|strong="H1356"\w*.’

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*—\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* animals.’

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* simple matter \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w attack|strong="H5221"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortified|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* importance. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w cut|strong="H5640"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w stop|strong="H5640"\w* \w up|strong="H5640"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w spring|strong="H4599"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* ruin \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w field|strong="H2513"\w* \w with|strong="H5892"\w* stones.”

\w The|strong="H4390"\w* next \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w*, \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H2009"\w* \w flowed|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w direction|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* Edom \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* land.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* could bear arms, young \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w old|strong="H4605"\w*, \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w summoned|strong="H6817"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w stationed|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w got|strong="H7925"\w* \w up|strong="H7925"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* shining \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H7925"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H4325"\w* red \w as|strong="H4325"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w across|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H5921"\w*.
